Deloitte Launchpad

From Helping Israeli founders scale in the US

What We Do

We support Israeli startup founders scaling and expanding in the US market through a community of like-minded entrepreneurs, personal guidance from dedicated teams in the US and Israel, and strategic programming.

Are We a Good Match?

The ideal startup will have the following

A Validated Product

Active traction in the market, an established customer base, VC backed (Post Seed - Round A+)

Over $500K in ARR

Positive YoY growth in revenue

A US Expansion Plan

companies with a relocation and/or expansion to the U.S on their two-year roadmap

Program Value

Deloitte Launchpad’s equity and fee-free program supports early-growth stage founders in four ways

01

Focus on improving your US go-to-market strategy

02

Support for expansion and relocation to the US

03

Access to our vast network of VCs and global Deloitte ecosystem

04

Lifelong community of fellow Israeli startup founders
